alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 9:45AM PST until December 24 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to around 2 inches in valleys and 3 to 6 inches in mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will lead to some areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County and Southwest Elko County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
